MEGA has zero tolerance for unlawful activity. For more information, please see our [A1]Terms of Service[/A1] and our [A2]Takedown Guidance Policy[/A2].

[P]Get support[/P]

If you have concerns about your thoughts or behaviour regarding sexual images of children, there is confidential, anonymous help available.

The Stop It Now project helps people deal with sexual thoughts about children and make positive changes that can improve their quality of life.

pricing_page_faq_answer_1: Yes, we provide a generous amount of storage for free. You can upgrade to one of our paid plans for more storage and [A]transfer quota[/A], and extra features like more security for your links.
pricing_page_faq_answer_2: Documents don’t take up much space, but media files like photos and videos do. If you’re planning on securely storing a lot of files, especially large ones, then one of our Pro plans would be best for your needs.
pricing_page_faq_answer_3: Transfer is the amount of data consumed by [A]downloading or streaming files from MEGA[/A]. Free accounts have a small, limited amount and accounts with paid plans are allocated a much higher capacity.
pricing_page_faq_answer_4: We accept payment by credit and debit card, or by Bitcoin.
pricing_page_faq_answer_4_2: Depending on your location, other payment methods may also be available.
pricing_page_faq_answer_5: Individual plans are designed for personal use, while our plan for businesses allows much greater flexibility in storage and transfer quota, as well as easy collaboration and a dedicated admin console to manage all users in a business.
pricing_page_faq_answer_6: Pro Flexi is a flexible storage plan charged by how much quota you use each month. The base quota for the plan is set at 3 TB of storage and 3 TB of transfer quota, charged at €15 per month. If you use any additional storage or transfer beyond your base 3 TB, you will be charged €2.50 per TB for the greater of extra storage used or extra transfer used.
pricing_page_faq_answer_6_2: For our users who want to store in excess of 16 TB this works out at the cheapest price per TB you can find, and our flexibility with costs means this is in high demand by those with lots of data to store.

transferit_faq_q1: How do I send and share large files with Transfer.it?
transferit_faq_q1_info2: [S]Choose how to share:[/S] [UL][LI]Create link: Get a private download link to share however you like.[/LI] [LI]Send files: Enter the recipient’s email address and we’ll email them the files directly.[/LI] [/UL]
transferit_faq_upd_q1: How do I send someone a file or folder with Transfer.it?
transferit_faq_upd_q1_info1: Step 1. Upload the file or folder.
transferit_faq_upd_q1_info2: Step 2. Choose how you want to share it: [UL][LI]As a link: Get a private download link to share however you like.[/LI][LI]As an email: Enter the recipient’s email address and they’ll be sent their own link.[/LI][/UL]
transferit_faq_upd_q1_info3: Step 3. Customise the transfer: [UL][LI]Set a password for accessing the download.[/LI][LI]Set a custom expiration date.[/LI][/UL]
transferit_faq_upd_q2: Do I need to sign up to use Transfer.it?
transferit_faq_upd_q2_info1: No, you don’t need an account to send or receive transfers through Transfer.it - however, you can sign in with your MEGA account, or (if you don’t already have one) create a free MEGA account to use Transfer.it.
transferit_faq_upd_q2_info2: Being logged into Transfer.it with a MEGA account gives you a dashboard for visibility and control over your transfers, and if you have a subscription with MEGA you’ll get even more benefits when using Transfer.it, like the option to remove the expiration date from links.
transferit_faq_upd_q3: What are the size limits for transfers?
transferit_faq_upd_q3_info1: Not only are there no size limits for transfers, but you can also upload as many files and folders in a single transfer as you like. This means you can upload folders containing thousands of files and complex subfolder structures, or files that are hundreds of gigabytes in size!
transferit_faq_upd_q4: When will my transfer expire or be deleted?
transferit_faq_upd_q4_info1: By default, transfers have an expiration date of 90 days after they’re created. Before uploading, you can change this in the settings.[BR]If you want to have the option to delete a transfer before it expires, before you get started, you’ll need to sign in with a MEGA account. You can create one for free [A]here[/A].
transferit_faq_upd_q5: What’s the difference between Transfer.it and MEGA?
transferit_faq_upd_q5_info1: Both use the same cloud platform but serve different needs.
transferit_faq_upd_q5_info2: Transfer.it is a quick file delivery service where no account is needed. It uses managed encryption keys for faster downloads, pre-zipped files, and smooth video streaming.
transferit_faq_upd_q5_info3: MEGA is full-featured cloud storage with a “privacy by design” model where only you hold the keys. It offers secure backups, device sync, and team collaboration.
transferit_faq_upd_q5_info4: Use Transfer.it for fast, simple sharing. Choose MEGA for privacy, storage, and control.
transferit_ftr_emails_info: Get notified when your transfers are received and accessed, giving you clearer visibility into transfer activity.
transferit_ftr_expiry_info: Set custom expiry dates for transfers. Keep files available for hours, days or weeks. You’re in control of who can access them and for how long.
transferit_ftr_hdr: Faster, larger, and more secure file transfers
transferit_ftr_integration_info: With your MEGA account, you can easily select files and folders from your MEGA storage and generate Transfer.it links.
transferit_ftr_pass_info: Only recipients with the correct password can access the shared files, ensuring data confidentiality.
transferit_ftr_preview_info: Easily preview images, documents, and videos before downloading.
transferit_ftr_sharing_hdr: Built for large and complex transfers
transferit_ftr_sharing_info: Transfer.it makes it easy to share large files and folders, including nested folders and complex collections of media or documents.
transferit_ftr_sharing_info2: You can select files directly from your MEGA account or upload new content for easy transfers.
transferit_ftr_super_fast_info: Enjoy industry-leading transfer speeds, ensuring files reach recipients quickly, no matter where they are.
transferit_ftr_super_fast_info2: Transfer.it is optimised for high-performance delivery, minimising wait times and maximising productivity.
transferit_ftr_unlim_dl_limits_info: There are no restrictions on how many times a transfer can be downloaded, ensuring recipients can access the files whenever they need
transferit_ftr_unlim_files_hdr: Unlimited number of files per transfer
transferit_ftr_unlim_files_info: Send as many files as you need in a single transfer - whether it’s one large video file or an entire project folder with thousands of documents, Transfer.it has no limits.
transferit_ftr_unlim_size_info: No more worrying about file size restrictions. Transfer.it lets you share files of any size, making it ideal for professionals, creatives, and businesses that work with large or complex collections.
transferit_ftr_unlim_transfers_info: Share as many files as you want, as often as you want.
transferit_ftr_unlim_transfers_info2: There are no caps on the number of transfers, making Transfer.it the perfect tool for frequent file sharing.
transferit_link_ready_tip: You can copy the download link, view the content, or share it:

transferit_overlay_info2: By using Transfer.it, you agree to provide us with the encryption keys for the selected files, which only you currently have access to. This will disable privacy by design for the selected files. Privacy by policy will apply going forward.
